original_title: The Zen Speaker: Breaking the Silence
overview: The story of prominent Las Vegas businesswoman Amy Ayoub, who found the courage to overcome the shame and trauma she kept hidden for 38 years. A personal portrait, the film explores the emotional and physical devastation associated with sex trafficking; survival, public vs private persona and finding oneâ€™s voice in unexpected ways.
title: The Zen Speaker: Breaking the Silence
